subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Bill Guerin snapped a scoreless tie in the second period and added a goal in the third to lift the host Islanders to victory in a matchup of the N.H.L’s lowest-scoring teams.
snippet: Bill Guerin snapped a scoreless tie in the second period and added a goal in the third to lift the host Islanders to victory in a matchup of the N.H.L’s lowest-scoring teams.
